scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist dist/cv && cp index.html index.css favicon.ico favicon.svg avatar.jpg dist/ && cp -R cv/. dist/cv/
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npx --yes html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-style-link-type-attributes --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html dist/index.html && npx --yes clean-css-cli -o dist/index.css dist/index.css
scripts.start: npm run build && sh -c 'python3 -m http.server ${PORT:-4173} --directory dist'
